definition: to flow back/reflux/circumfluence/refluence/backward flow/returning flow (e.g. of talent)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: It is said that reshoring is a growing trend.
sentences.chinese: 据说企业“回流”将呈增长趋势。

sentences.english: The proposed repeat of the corporate tax repatriation holiday is one such wolf in sheep's clothing.
sentences.chinese: 重提回流资金减税就是这种批着羊皮的狼。

sentences.english: Time of recirculating and eluting must be over 3 h.
sentences.chinese: 回流洗脱时间一定大于3小时。

sentences.english: Copper tubing shall not be used on the downstream side of the backflow preventer.
sentences.chinese: 在防回流阀的下游不应该安装铜管。

sentences.english: In addition, the taper also affects the original position of the backward flow.
sentences.chinese: 此外，锥度对于回流的初始发生位置也产生了影响。

sentences.english: Certain jobs have been dribbling back to the U.S. for a few years.
sentences.chinese: 某些职位多年来一直在往美国回流。

sentences.english: As a result, it is important to minimize the number of times your code results in a re-flow and re-paint.
sentences.chinese: 因此，减少代码中回流和重绘的次数就尤为重要。

sentences.english: The efficiency of UPE was better than heat reflux extraction.
sentences.chinese: 超高压提取的效率优于热回流提取。

sentences.english: The gate valve with the test cock is to mounted on the inlet side of the backflow preventer .
sentences.chinese: 带有测试旋塞的闸阀安装在防回流阀的进口一侧。

sentences.english: The action of effluent recycle on an upflow anaerobic filter is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 出水回流对上流式厌氧滤器的影响非常复杂。

sentences.english: That means both reflow soldering and wave soldering are used.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着既回流焊和波峰焊使用。

sentences.english: Superior solder ability and resistance to soldering heat, ldeal for wave or reflow soldering.
sentences.chinese: 优良的可焊性及耐热冲击性，适合波峰焊及回流焊。

sentences.english: Reflux the mixture untill no tin remains.
sentences.chinese: 回流此混合物直至没有锡剩下。

sentences.english: It occurs when twisting of the spermatic cord cuts off the venous drainage, leading to hemorrhagic infarction.
sentences.chinese: 精索扭转阻断静脉回流就会导致出血性梗死。

sentences.english: Upon completion of the Three Gorges project, the sewage will back up in the reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 大坝建成后，这些污水将回流至水库中。

sentences.english: The auxiliary line shall consist of an approved backflow preventer and water meter.
sentences.chinese: 辅助管路应该由通过认证的防回流阀和水表构成。

definition: to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
hot money, money flowing from one currency to another in the hope of quick profit
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
(of soil etc) to wash away/to be eroded/(fig.) (of talented staff, followers of a religious faith, investment funds etc) to go elsewhere/to fail to be retained
